definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Tuo1 ma3 si1 · Si4 te4 en1 si1 · Ai4 lu:e4 te4
containing_words.word: 托馬斯·斯特恩斯·艾略特

definition: Thomas Aquinas (1225-1274), Italian Catholic priest in the Dominican Order, philosopher and theologian in the scholastic tradition
pinyin: Tuo1 ma3 si1 · A1 kui2 na4

sentences.english: She has has experience as a reporter, but Greg and Thomas haven't.
sentences.chinese: 她有當記者的經歷，而格來格和托馬斯則沒有。

sentences.english: I have no personal vendetta against Clarence Thomas.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有私人仇報克拉倫斯托馬斯。

sentences.english: entered into an advertising dalliance with Google, but this fell apart after antitrust authorities signalled that they would not approve such an agreement.
sentences.chinese: 但是因反托馬斯當局的不贊成，他們的聯盟落空。

sentences.english: I was with Tomas, a friend who'd lived with us for a while when he had been renovating his own house.
sentences.chinese: 有個朋友叫托馬斯，在他翻新房子時暫時住在我們這。

sentences.english: This is Thomas Watt, the manager of The E-Commerce Transactions Company in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 這是托馬斯的電子經理瓦電子商務交易在新加坡公司。

sentences.english: Thomas made a little grimace, perhaps he thought the wine was sour.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯微微皺起眉頭可能是他認爲酒發酸了。

sentences.english: Translated into French prose from a poem by Thomas Moore.
sentences.chinese: 散文翻譯成法文，從詩的托馬斯莫爾。

sentences.english: Did you talk to Greg Olden or Thomas Jones?
sentences.chinese: 你同格來格。頓或托馬斯。瓊斯談過了嗎？

sentences.english: Corey Maggette scored 23 points and Tim Thomas had 20 for the Clippers.
sentences.chinese: 馬蓋蒂，托馬斯爲快船分別拿下了23及20分。

sentences.english: The Republicans nominated New York State Governor Thomas Dewey.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨提名托馬斯杜爲紐約州長。

sentences.english: Thomas took off his overcoat and hung it on the hook.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯脫下外套，掛在衣鉤上。

sentences.english: Thank you TREM for your help every day.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝托馬斯謝謝你們每天的幫助。

sentences.english: The only guard in NBA history tougher than Iverson was Isiah Thomas.
sentences.chinese: NBA歷史上只有強硬的後衛艾弗森比伊塞亞托馬斯。

sentences.english: After Sir Thomas comes back, he tries to control the Crawfords' force.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯爵士歸來後，對克勞福特的氣焰有所壓制。

sentences.english: The baby girl is Thomas' first child. Beatie said the baby was not delivered via C-section.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯說，這個孩子並非剖腹生產。

sentences.english: Pleading Mass case is the United States adjudicates this kind of case first.
sentences.chinese: 托馬斯案是美國首次判決此類案件。

definition: Russell (name)/Bertrand Arthur William, 3rd Earl Russell (1872-1970), British logician, rationalist philosopher and pacifist
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
